This app demonstrates:

1. All parameters of `insert_ui`:
   - `ui`: Both text elements and cards
   - `selector`: User can choose target container
   - `where`: All four possible positions
   - `multiple`: Toggle for inserting to multiple matches
   - `immediate`: Toggle for immediate insertion

2. Features:
   - Three target containers for insertion
   - Two types of insertable content (text and cards)
   - Timestamps on inserted elements
   - Clear functionality
   - Visual feedback for insertions
   - Font Awesome icons for enhanced UI

3. Technical aspects:
   - Uses Express mode syntax
   - Reactive counter for unique IDs
   - Event handling for buttons
   - Clean UI organization with sidebar layout
   - Bootstrap styling classes
   - Font Awesome integration

To run this app:

1. Requirements:
```
pip install shiny pandas
```

2. Usage:
- Select a target container from the dropdown
- Choose insertion position
- Toggle multiple/immediate options
- Click either "Insert Text" or "Insert Card"
- Use "Clear All" to remove inserted elements

The app provides a comprehensive demonstration of `insert_ui`'s capabilities while maintaining a clean and intuitive interface.
